txt.en: Before the burned cottage stands an evil-looking relic. Staring at the relic, your blood boils, though you can identify no good reason for it. You shake your head, and the feeling passes.

'As if Burt and I have not suffered enough at the hands of the Orcs, now we have to deal with someone setting our home afire? If we had the means, my brother and I would go somewhere, but where else could we go? We were living in this cottage because there is nowhere else to go!'
'What have we done to deserve this?'
Mysterious Relic in the North Downs
'I don't know what this artifact is, but it makes me so angry!'
A mysterious relic appeared outside the Peake's abandoned farmhouse in the North Downs.
Ted Farmer is outside the cottage he was dwelling in with his brother Burt, staring at the frightening relic someone placed there as the cottage burned.
